section.title: XML Representation
section.code-fragment:
GDEF GDEF = element GDEF { attribute major { "1" }, attribute minor { "0" }, element glyphClassDef { classDefTableOffset }?, element attachList { attachListTableOffset }?, element ligCaretList { ligCaretListTableOffset }?, element markAttachClassDef { classDefTableOffset }?,
( standaloneClassDefTable | standaloneAttachListTable | standaloneLigCaretListTable | standaloneLigGlyphTable | standaloneCaretValueTable | standaloneCoverageTable | standaloneDeviceTable)* }
